Company: Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey Inc.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance
Info Source: HORIZON TO PAY $200,000 FINE FOR LATE CLAIMS IN NEW JERSEY, Bestwire, October 17, 2003 (via Nexis).

Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Description: Respondents incorrectly processed certain claims for services rendered by out of network providers for persons covered by small employer health plans and individual health coverage plans.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance
New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Description: Respondents experienced difficulties in access to the utilization management telephone line and delays in processing prior authorization requests.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Description: Made multiple errors in the processing of provider claims from July 1, 2015 to March 28, 2016.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Company: Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey, Inc.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Company: Horizon Healthcare Services, Inc. and Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey Inc.
Description: Respondent Horizon Healthcare Services, Inc. failed to promptly comply with decisions of the Independent Health Care Appeals Program (IHCAP), failed to properly compute interest on claims paid after IHCAP reversals, improperly paid claims following IHCAP decisions to providers rather than covered persons where the claims were submitted without an assignment of benefits and the covered person had already paid the provider and failed to respond to Department inquiries.  Respondent Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey, Inc. was found to have engaged in multiple improper business practices as a result of market conduct examination, including but not limited to, untimely claim processing, failure to promptly comply with stage 1 appeal decisions and IHCAP reversals, failure to properly compute interest, improper claim denials and claim payment errors. Respondent Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey, Inc. also improperly denied certain claims for third party liability.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Company: Horizon Healthcare of New Jersey, Inc.
Description: Respondent delayed in providing authorized medical supplies to members.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance

Description: Respondent paid a rebate of premium to policyholders and failed to report a distribution or dividend to the Commissioner.
Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance
